data.title: Court Denies Crypto Bank Custodia's Bid to Pry Master Account From Unwilling Fed
data.description:
Custodia said it may request a rehearing on the matter, after a panel of judges ruled 2-1 to affirm a district court’s prior ruling denying the crypto bank Fed access.
source: https://decrypt.co/347022/court-denies-crypto-bank-custodia-bid-pry-master-account-fed

data.title: Singapore Freezes $150M in Assets Tied to Alleged Bitcoin Fraud Kingpin
data.description:
Singapore authorities seized $150 million in assets connected to Chen Zhi as U. S. and UK prosecutors pursue criminal charges over an alleged $14. 4 billion Bitcoin fraud operation involving forced labor and cryptocurrency laundering.
source: https://cryptonews.com/news/singapore-freezes-150m-in-assets-tied-to-alleged-bitcoin-fraud-kingpin/

data.title: Caitlin Long’s crypto bank loses appeal over Fed master account
data.description:

data.title: No China holiday surge for oil exporters as EVs dominate roads
data.description:
China’s electric vehicle (EV) boom has seen another upward trend, having seen increased usage for long-distance journeys during the Chinese festive season. However, exporters are far from being festive this period due to the potential ramifications this development would have in the global oil markets. The country saw reduced consumption of gasoline during China’s Golden […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/no-china-holiday-surge-for-oil-exporters/

data.title: European Central Bank to 'Accelerate' CBDC Plans, Eyeing 2029 Digital Euro Rollout
data.description:
Europe could see the digital euro issued continent-wide as early as 2029, after a potential CBDC pilot in mid-2027.
source: https://decrypt.co/347019/european-central-bank-accelerate-cbdc-plans-eyeing-2029-digital-euro-rollout

data.title: Bankman-Fried Claims FTX Was Never Insolvent And FTT Token Would Be Worth $22 Billion
data.description:
Sam Bankman-Fried’s X account posted a link to a document on late Thursday claiming that the FTX exchange “was never insolvent. ”
source: https://zycrypto.com/bankman-fried-claims-ftx-was-never-insolvent-and-ftt-token-would-be-worth-22-billion/
